user.title: Všeobecné nastavenie

data.name: Jedinečný názov integrácie
data.use_weather_service: Use a weather service (Open Weather Map or Pirate Weather) for weather data or forecasting. Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irigation will not be able to use forecasts.

step1.description: Ak potrebujete pomoc s konfiguráciou, pozrite si https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

error.auth: Weather service API key or version incorrect
error.invalid_coordinates: Neplatné súradnice. Skontrolujte hodnoty zemepisnej šírky (-90 až 90) a zemepisnej dĺžky (-180 až 180).

Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irigation will not be able to use forecasts.
